name: Breezona
shortDescription: Private 1BHK with plunge pool — clean, modern and perfect for couples.
longDescription: Breezona blends relaxed coastal styling with modern convenience. The one-bedroom layout opens onto a private plunge pool and sun deck for quiet mornings and sunset dips. Inside you’ll find a comfy living area, a compact kitchenette with essentials, and fast Wi-Fi — everything you need for an easy, relaxing stay.

images.alt: Breezona private pool and sun deck at golden hour

name: Casa De Solares
shortDescription: Spacious 2BHK family home with private garden — ideal for families & groups.
longDescription: Casa De Solares offers comfortable family living with two bedrooms, a full kitchen, and a private garden for outdoor dining. Managed locally by Bay Dream, this home is suited for longer stays and family trips, with secure parking, reliable Wi-Fi, and attentive host support when needed.

images.alt: Casa De Solares front garden and outdoor dining area
